http://www.theog.co.title: Team | The One Group Agency
http://www.theog.co.content: Team | The One Group Agency The OG Team WE DO COOL STUFF From scroll-stopping content to pixel-perfect websites, OG brings the vibes across production, social, and web. We don‚Äôt just make things look good ‚Äî we make them work hard. Meet the creative minds behind OG ‚Äî the team turning bold ideas into unforgettable brand experiences. MATT BORCK Partner & Head, Videography MATT BORCK Partner & Head, Videography MATT BORCK Partner & Head, Videography What is your claim to fame? Once performed in a literal bullring in Mexico‚Ä¶ and also sang on the French Riviera. Same guy, same guitar - very different vibes. JAIMIE ASHWORTH Director, Operations JAIMIE ASHWORTH Director, Operations JAIMIE ASHWORTH Director, Operations What is your favourite part of your job? Collaborating with a team of experts with all different specialties‚Äîthere‚Äôs always something new to learn. I also really enjoy meeting with clients and turning complex ideas into clear, actionable plans. JONATHAN SPOONER Director, Content & Creative JONATHAN SPOONER Director, Content & Creative JONATHAN SPOONER Director, Content & Creative What is your claim to fame? Swam competitively for 10 years MATT BOURNE Head, Photography MATT BOURNE Head, Photography MATT BOURNE Head, Photography What is your claim to fame? I was part of the team that won an award for best live broadcast during the Stanley cup riots from CNN PAMELA CHUA Senior Manager, Content & Strategy PAMELA CHUA Senior Manager, Content & Strategy PAMELA CHUA Senior Manager, Content & Strategy What is your claim to fame? I was blonde for about 4 years! Some people don't even recognize me without the blonde hair. BERNI SAMSON PROJECT MANAGER BERNI SAMSON PROJECT MANAGER BERNI SAMSON PROJECT MANAGER What is your claim to fame? I once hit the high note in the song Hallelujah SHELBY WICK Project Manager (remove Producer) SHELBY WICK Project Manager (remove Producer) SHELBY WICK Project Manager (remove Producer) What is your favourite part of your job? Working with other creatives on shoots and bringing a vision to life! JACQUI OZGUR Manager, Operations JACQUI OZGUR Manager, Operations JACQUI OZGUR Manager, Operations What is your claim to fame? I am also a permanent makeup artist. ETHAN JOHNSON CONTENT CREATOR ETHAN JOHNSON CONTENT CREATOR ETHAN JOHNSON CONTENT CREATOR Favourite Pastime? A good drive REGAN VARNIER SOCIAL MEDIA COORDINATOR REGAN VARNIER SOCIAL MEDIA COORDINATOR REGAN VARNIER SOCIAL MEDIA COORDINATOR What is your claim to fame? I‚Äôm Italian, and my name in Italian is Regina. I also just so happened to be born on Saint Regina‚Äôs Day. KASIA LAJLO Graphic Designer KASIA LAJLO Graphic Designer KASIA LAJLO Graphic Designer What is your claim to fame? One time I created a painting using anything but a paint brush. Some of the tools included a cheese grater, skipping rope and a tennis racket. MANOJ MANATHUNGA DIGITAL ADS STRATEGIST MANOJ MANATHUNGA DIGITAL ADS STRATEGIST MANOJ MANATHUNGA DIGITAL ADS STRATEGIST Favourite Part of your Job? Trading attention. Testing ideas fast, scaling what works, and driving real ROI. JUSTIN CUNANAN Head, Design JUSTIN CUNANAN Head, Design JUSTIN CUNANAN Head, Design What is your claim to fame? Eating a full order of pasta at Anton's twice. LORI CRUMP Project Manager LORI CRUMP Project Manager LORI CRUMP Project Manager Whats your claim to fame? My husband and I lived in Bali for a few years before we had kids and I got to work as a Project Manager for the building of an Equestrian centre which has now become one of the leading horse riding centres in southeast Asia. KAREN NGUYEN SOCIAL MEDIA COORDINATOR KAREN NGUYEN SOCIAL MEDIA COORDINATOR KAREN NGUYEN SOCIAL MEDIA COORDINATOR Whats your claim to fame? According to my Lifestyle DNA test results, I metabolize caffeine pretty quickly‚Äîwhich means my body breaks it down and clears it out faster than average. So I‚Äôm less likely to get those jittery or anxious side effects. That probably explains why I felt totally fine after downing seven shots of espresso during my visit to the Illy Coffee headquarters in Italy. JARED HARMAN CEO & CO-FOUNDER JARED HARMAN CEO & CO-FOUNDER JARED HARMAN CEO & CO-FOUNDER What is your claim to fame? I was in the movie MVP: Most Valuable Primate Join the Team Behind the Magic We‚Äôre always looking for passionate creatives to grow with us.
